ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: So the Great Blast seized hold of them at the break of day.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: So they were seized by the mighty blast at break of day;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Then the mighty Blast caught them at sunrise,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: An explosion struck them at sunrise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Therefore the scream overcame them at sunrise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So the Sayhah overtook them at the time of sunrise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So the rumbling overtook them (while) entering upon the time of sunrise;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and the Cry seized them at the sunrise,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Then the (Awful) Cry overtook them at the sunrise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and thereupon the blast [of Our punishment] overtook them at sunrise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then the shout took hold of them at the sunrise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: So the Cry seized them at sunrise,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But the (mighty) Blast overtook them before morning,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So As-Saihah (torment - awful cry, etc.) overtook them at the time of sunrise;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: At sunrise a dreadful Shout seized them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: So the Blast struck them at sunrise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So the shriek seized them at sunrise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [15:73] Then the Cry, the Cry of Gabriel, seized them at sunrise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Then the (Awful) Cry) of chastisement (overtook them at the sunrise) when the sun was rising.
